channel.title: Quest NPCs
channel.description: Okay so when someone is doing a quest on my 317 delta base server and try to attack an npc they're supposed to to complete the quest they can't. But, when they aren't they can attack the NPC. Here's hat's in my client class [code]if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1220 && q4 == 1) break;[/code] Now originally it was [code]if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1220 && q4 != 1) break;[/code] But, that didn't work either so I switched it to the first one and still no luck :(. PLease help me!

item.title: Quest NPCs
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Okay so when someone is doing a quest on my 317 delta base server and try to attack an npc they’re supposed to to complete the quest they can’t. But, when they aren’t they can attack the NPC. Here’s hat’s in my client class if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1220 && q4 == 1) break; Now originally it was if(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 1220 && q4 != 1) break; But, that didn’t work either so I switched it to the first one and still no luck :(. PLease help me!

Read full topic
